cons: Nothing to report at the moment.

review_title: Good access to senior talent in the ad industry but siloed working
pros: Have great exposure to senior talent Interesting work
cons: Siloed departments which often means people are very precious over their work Management can sometimes be negative when trying to do new things/innovate

review_title: Sophisticated dump to avoid at all costs
pros: Luxury office with high tech equipment  and sophisticated facilities ... just to impress... for those private board meetings
cons:
Dysfunctional working environment. 
Toxic workforce with sickening, disturbing and unprofessional behaviour. 
A place run by the white middle class full of privilege and prejudice.
Lack of positive working culture values and effective implementation.
Those in power do as they wish and get away with everything.
Beware of those who have been there for donkey years and seem terribly nice even though nobody "survives" under their leadership.
